title: Erik Buch Bar Stool
body: The organic and functional structure of Eric Buch’s design characterised the true Danish design tradition, evident in Erik Buch Bar Stool from 1964. The use of solid maple wood creates a refreshing, organic look that's enhanced by distinctive grain patterns for natural artistry. A cushioned seat with lipped edges curves up just slightly to create a small lower back for optimal comfort and support while a footrest built into the base provides added support. This stool is a perfect addition to any international interior.
